item.title: Keyli's Story - Casa de Amistad
item.description:
Keyli's Story - Casa de Amistad

Keyli is a student that receives tutoring assistance from Casa de Amistad. Casa de Amistad, Centro de Ense√±anza is a nonprofit organization dedicated to fostering the education and character development of Latino children and their families in coastal North County San Diego. www.casadeamistad.org Shot with Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera

item.title: Casa de Amistad- 2013
item.description:
Casa de Amistad- 2013

Learn about the important work being done by Casa de Amistad. They are an educational non-profit tutoring students in north county coastal San Diego. The students primarily come from homes where English is not the first language. Learn more about this great organization at www.casadeamistad.org. Produced by Doug Peterson for SimpleTruthMedia.
